name: Incremento
description:
INKREMENTO is a simple, casual puzzle game. 

The goal is to fill the board with different numbers starting at 1 - so for a 3x3 field that would be the numbers 1 to 9 - just by adding or substracting 1 from a row or column.

You can get the whole game for free in the appstore, and if you like it you can help us by purchasing the Ad-Free Version.
